txt.en: The berries here are certainly not edible, or else the bats would have eaten them.
Upon examination of the nearby berry-bushes, you suspect that the berries may not be edible. There is only one reliable test for this....
The berries here are certainly not edible, or else the bats would have eaten them.\n\nIt is likely the injured man ate food that will only speed his death, not stave it off!
Upon examination of the nearby berry-bushes, you suspect that the berries may not be edible. There is only one reliable test for this....
There are no berries in these droppings
Berry-bushes can be found near the injured man's camp-site.
Examine bat-droppings for traces of berries ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bat-droppings can be found near the injured man's camp-site in the centre of Fangorn's eaves.\n\nYou should examine the bat-droppings to see if bats eat the berries in question.
